translation.about_all_orders: The bet multiplier for each order is fixed and does not change
translation.line_1_about_martingale: If you lose, you will move to the right and use the new value to enter the next order. If you win or end the series, you will return to the beginning of the sequence
translation.line_2_about_victor2: - If you lose on sequence 1, move from left to right. If you win at any position, move down to sequence 2.
translation.line_3_about_victor2: - If you win in sequence 2, go back to (1,1), if you lose, go back to the next position in sequence 1 (move diagonally upwards).
translation.line_2_about_victor3: - If you lose on sequence 1, move from left to right. If you win, move down to sequence 2 at the same position.
translation.line_3_about_victor3: - If you win in sequence 2, continue to move down to sequence 3 in the same position, if you lose, go back to the next position in sequence 1.
translation.line_4_about_victor3: - If you win in sequence 3, return to position (1,1), if you lose, return to the next position in sequence 1.
translation.line_5_about_victor3: - The end of sequence 1 will return to (1,1)
translation.line_2_about_victor4: - If you lose on sequence 1, move from left to right. If you win, move down to sequence 2 at the same position.
translation.line_3_about_victor4: - If you win in sequence 2, continue to move down to sequence 3 in the same position, if you lose, go back to the next position in sequence 1.
translation.line_4_about_victor4: - If you win in sequence 3, continue to move down to sequence 4 with the same position, if you lose, go back to the next position in sequence 1.
translation.line_5_about_victor4: - If you win in sequence 4, return to position (1,1), if you lose, return to the next position in sequence 1.
translation.line_2_about_custom_autowin: - Row 1 and 3 will be the index (max value = the length of row 2); row 2 is the order amount
translation.line_3_about_custom_autowin: - If you win, use the value of row 1; if you lose, use the value of row 3 as the position for row 2 to enter the next order.
translation.the_plan_will_pause_when: The plan will pause when one of these conditions is reached.
translation.portfolio_is_not_exists: Portfolio is not exists or not running
translation.this_portfolio_is_running: This portfolio is running, can't start
translation.des_expert_mode: All users who are following the current user will enter when the signal is generated.
translation.des_private_mode: Other user will not be able to copy your plan when you enable Private mode
translation.des_reverse_signal: You will open the opposite order to the receiving signal
